articles.title: 30 Essential Home Purchases You Need To Just Buy Already
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article presents a selection of household products and tools for home improvement and organization. Some featured items include an Instant Pot multi-cooker, a Tushy bidet attachment, Oxo over-the-drain hair stopper, Bissell multi-purpose portable cleaner, and printable Wi-Fi signs from Pastel Design Studio.

articles.title: Don't Miss Free Samsung Offer To Millions Of Galaxy Phones And Tablets
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a major free subscription to users of their phones or tablets.

articles.title: 2026 Tesla Model Y price and specs
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Tesla launched a flagship Performance grade of its Model Y electric SUV earlier this year.

articles.title: This Laundry Detergent Bottle Solves A Common Problem
articles.author: Marsha Badger
articles.summary: Swash has introduced a new ultra-concentrated liquid laundry detergent designed to prevent overuse and simplify laundry routines. The detergent features an innovative auto-stop top for precise dispensing and the 30-ounce bottle handles up to 80 loads. It is available at Walmart for $17.78.

articles.title: Meet the new personal barista in your home
articles.summary: Ninja introduces its new coffee machine, Ninja Luxe, to the Israeli market, aiming to redefine the morning coffee experience.

articles.title: Samsung's new viral Galaxy Z Flip7 is already on sale for its lowest price ever
articles.author: njdotcom
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip7 is now available at a discounted price on Amazon. This phone features up to 512 GB of storage, a 50MP camera, 24-hour battery life, Android 16 with Samsung's One UI 8 OS, AMOLED displays with 120 Hz refresh rate, Galaxy AI, Google Gemini integration and FlexMode.

articles.title: Samsung's new viral Galaxy Z Flip7 is already on sale for its lowest price ever
articles.author: Sarah Vazquez
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Flip7, a foldable phone featuring a 6.9-inch screen that folds down to 4.1 inches. The phone includes up to 512 GB of storage, a 50MP camera, an upgraded battery, Android 16 with Samsung's One UI 8 OS, and Galaxy AI. Currently, there is a limited-time deal available where you can save $150 off each version.

articles.title: This new AI voice recorder wants to be your affordable transcription device
articles.author: Richard Priday
articles.summary: Soundcore is launching the Soundcore Work, a new AI voice recorder, at IFA 2025 in Berlin. The device, priced at $99/£99, uses dual mics and GPT-4.1 to provide 97% accurate transcription in over 100 languages, with optional subscription for additional features.

articles.title: Animation shows the folding mechanism of the triple-foldable
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Samsung is delaying the launch of its Galaxy Z Trifold but has revealed a new 'G-Fold' design, which uses a three-screen, two-hinge inward folding system. The phone will include features such as reverse charging, NFC, multitasking optimized for three screens, and One UI 8 integration, with a limited initial release planned.

articles.title: Starbucks' pain, Chinese Chain Luckin Coffee's gain in U.S.? From number of stores to taste - here is a comparison
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Luckin Coffee has launched four stores in Manhattan, marking its entry into the United States. The company's retail model focuses on mobile ordering, inventive drinks, and discounts. This expansion challenges Starbucks in its home market, with Luckin having already surpassed Starbucks in China.

articles.title: Teen YouTube star's makeup launch descends into chaos as hundreds of screaming kids overwhelm mall
articles.summary: Teen social media star Salish Matter debuted her new makeup line at the American Dream Mall in New Jersey. The launch attracted a large crowd of young fans and their parents.

articles.title: AMD calls AI ‘underhyped' at IFA Berlin — chipmaker says the ‘perfect PC' comes first
articles.author: Luke James
articles.summary: AMD is focusing on AI, GPUs and NPUs for the future of PCs and building systems for secure and efficient AI applications. FidelityFX Super Resolution 'Redstone' is still on track for release in the second half of this year, promising performance gains.

articles.title: Tesla proposes package for Musk that could top $1tn
articles.author: Kuwait Times
articles.summary: Tesla unveiled a proposal on Friday.

articles.title: Secret NYC sex-doll showroom gives customers a chance to get up close and personal with plastic partners
articles.author: nypost
articles.summary: A secret shop in the Upper East Side has released a new sex doll designed to comfort men who suffer from premature ejaculation. Customers who visit the shop to meet their new synthetic sex partner must sign a nondisclosure agreement and adhere to the rule 'Pants stay on!'

articles.title: Exploring the Unique Features of nimedes: What Sets It Apart?
articles.author: Kristina Newsbrig.Com
articles.summary: Nimedes is introduced as a new platform redefining business operations with user-centric design. It offers features like a customizable dashboard, advanced analytics, and integrated communication channels. Several organizations, including a nonprofit, a retail company, and a tech startup, have successfully implemented nimedes to improve communication, inventory management, and project monitoring.

articles.title: GST 2.0: How to Check Your Savings on Products After Reforms
articles.author: International Business Times
articles.summary: The government has introduced a dedicated website 'savingwitgst.in'. Consumers can use this website to check and compare product prices before and after GST reforms.

articles.title: How to trade crypto using ChatGPT
articles.author: Arjun Parashar
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT, a generative AI chatbot, which has been updated to provide various services, including professional advice. Traders are using ChatGPT to access market predictions and restructure investment strategies. Zerodha's CEO, Nithin Kamath, acknowledges the potential shift AI brings to financial services.

articles.title: Next shoppers say caped dress gets them 'lots of compliments' at special occasions
articles.author: Alice Rush
articles.summary: Next is featuring the Next Cape Maxi Dress, available in multiple colors and retailing for €93. Additionally, Next offers the Jolie Moi Black Plain Twist Front Tulip Midi Dress, currently on sale for €63. Shoppers can choose between home delivery or store collection for a small fee.

articles.title: India Today Group's MO Launches Secret Lives of Teenagers Podcast with Swiggy as Presenting Partner
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: MO, India Today Group's GenZ brand, launched a new Insta First series called Secret Lives of Teenagers (SLOT). Swiggy is presenting the six-part series, which aims to provide insights into the values and perspectives of Gen Z. The series is designed to be a cultural playground for India's most influential generation.

articles.title: is sweeping consoles and pc
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Team Cherry launched Hollow Knight: Silksong on September 4th across multiple platforms, including Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, Xbox, PC, Mac, and Linux. The game achieved over half a million concurrent players on Steam and quickly dominated console sales charts. It is priced at €19.50 and included in Xbox Game Pass.

articles.title: 28 Products That Reviewers Love
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Essence launched Lash Princess mascara, designed to lengthen and volumize lashes with its cone-shaped fiber brush. Kitsch introduced a satin heatless curling set for creating curls without heat damage. First Aid Beauty launched KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant to improve dry, patchy, or bumpy skin. Revlon released a one-step hairdryer and volumizer brush to simultaneously dry and style hair. Tonymoly introduced an octopus-shaped blackhead remover to clear out clogged pores.

articles.title: BSNL புதிய ரீசார்ஜ் திட்டம் அறிமுகம்.. வாடிக்கையாளர்களுக்கு சூப்பர் சலுகைகள்!
articles.summary: BSNL launched a new recharge plan for new customers. This plan offers a validity of 72 days.

articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Grunwald Germans is launching a content writing service in the fourth quarter of 2025, shifting from virtual assistance to a production-focused model. The service emphasizes task completion, high volume, and cost-effectiveness, targeting blog posts, product descriptions, and website content. This new service will focus in industries like e-commerce, affiliate marketing and small business.

articles.title: 2026 Xpeng G6 AWD Performance review: Quick drive
articles.author: Neil Briscoe
articles.summary: Xpeng G6 is highlighted for its super-fast charging capabilities, solid performance, and convincing premium feel.

articles.title: 2026 Xpeng G6 AWD Performance review: Quick drive
articles.author: Neil Briscoe
articles.summary: Xpeng G6 features super-fast charging and solid performance. It also offers a convincing premium feel.

articles.title: 2026 Xpeng G6 AWD Performance review: Quick drive
articles.author: Neil Briscoe
articles.summary: Xpeng's G6 boasts super-fast charging and solid performance. The vehicle offers a premium feel.

articles.title: My Kindle lockscreen was super bland until I found this secret setting
articles.author: Kelsey Fogarty
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing a new feature for Kindle e-readers that allows users to display the cover of their current book on the lock screen. This feature is supported on Standard 8th generation and later, Paperwhite 7th generation and later, Oasis (all models), Voyage 7th generation and later, and Colorsoft Kindles. The feature is only available on ad-free Kindles, but users can pay to remove ads to enable it.

articles.title: Top Summer Cleaning Products To Tackle Any Mess
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Good Store offers a bundle of eco-friendly dish cleaning supplies, including dishwashing tabs, solid dish soap, and a scrub brush, with 100% of profits going to charity. Gear Hugger provides eco-friendly concentrated car wash, plant-based and safe for kids and pets. Dreame introduces a cordless 2-in-1 vacuum and mop featuring self-propelling, self-drying, and self-cleaning capabilities.

articles.title: 38 Products You'll Seriously Wonder How You Lived Your Life This Long Without Knowing About
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Eos introduces its Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion, a cost-effective alternative to pricier options like Starbucks' lattes. Dossier offers "Ambery Vanilla" perfume, a budget-friendly substitute for YSL's Black Opium. Medicube launches the Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer, featuring poppable capsules for skin revival.

articles.title: WHMCS Alternative Domain and Web Hosting Signup PHP Script + Template = $25 /one time fee
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart introduced a PHP script for domain name and web hosting orders. This script features domain availability checker with WHOIS, RDAP, DNS and Registrar API, multi-TLD search and AI domain suggestion tool. It also includes multi-coupon code and 25+ payment options with multi-currency.

articles.title: 28 Comfy Basics You'll Never Want To Change Out Of
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new clothing items, including leggings, tops, skirts, and pants. These items are frequently compared to existing products from brands like Lululemon and Skims, highlighting their features, benefits, and value propositions.

articles.title: Swiggy Launches ‘Giftables' — On-Demand Instant Gifting Platform Just in Time for Festive Season
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Swiggy has launched Giftables, a new service within its app, designed to simplify gifting. Giftables offers curated gifts across various categories and will soon offer AI-powered personalized recommendations. The service is currently live in Bangalore and will expand to other metros, enabling users to send personalized gifts within 10-60 minutes.

articles.title: James Dyson Lifts the Curtain on the Future of Home Tech at Berlin Showcase
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Dyson unveiled 11 new products, including the Dyson PencilVac, Dyson V8 Cyclone with upgraded suction and runtime, the Dyson V16 Piston Animal, the Dyson Spot+Scrub Ai robot with AI-powered stain detection, and the Dyson HushJet™ Purifier Compact. The company aims to reinvent cleaning, purifying, and styling with its cutting-edge hardware.

articles.title: 40 Beauty Products If You Refuse To Spend Over $20
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Fwee launched a 3D moisturizing gloss with customizable pigment levels for smoothing lines and adding shine. Elizavecca offers a hair treatment with ceramides and collagen for smoothness and shine in five minutes. Essence introduced Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops to create a golden glow, while Gold Bond released a firming neck and chest cream with salicylic acid for exfoliation and hydration. Several brands, including E.l.f., Peripera, Wet n Wild, Byoma, Nivea, Lottabody, Hard as Hoof, Dior, Clinique, Ogx, Milk, Tarte, Good Molecules, Medicube, Cosrx, Beauty Blender, Tatcha, L'Oreal, Touch in Sol, Maybelline, It Comsetics, Mixsoon, Anua, Skala, Kahi, and Mielle also introduced new products.

articles.title: UnGPT: Transforming AI Text Naturally
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Gaxos.ai Inc. has launched UnGPT.ai, a tool for transforming AI-generated text into natural, human-like content. Key features include an Adaptive Text Engine for tone adjustment, Contextual Synonym Intelligence, Seamless Web Integration via a browser extension, and Recursive Refinement for multi-layer enhancement.

articles.title: If You Want To Get Better At Doing Your Hair, These 45 Products Are Game Changers
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new hair care products and tools. Revlon is launching a one-step hair dryer and volumizer. JVN is introducing Air Dry Cream for frizz-free air drying. Color Wow is launching anti-humidity spray and Money Mist leave-in conditioner. L'Oreal is launching root-concealing spray and lamellar water treatment. Pantene is introducing Pro-Vitamin Essence for hair damage repair.

articles.title: 30 Practical Purchases That'll Have You Feeling Adult
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content introduces several new products, including a drip catcher, hoodie hanger, Color Catcher sheets, dog-paw scrubber, keyboard planner, outlet extender, food savers, mock-neck top, Pikk-it tool, shoe-stretch spray, Sheet Keeper, shower spray, carborundum sponges, Trtl travel pillow, wireless lace bralette, battery storage caddy, pet hair roller, WD-40 pen, sockless shoe liners, plant cleaning wipes, aligner cleaner foam, Howard Products Feed-N-Wax, Windex outdoor glass cleaner, water bottle organizer, stain-removing pads, coffee maker cleaner tablets, waterproof trash can, garbage guard, microchip pet feeder, and embroidered Hoka Cliftons. These products aim to solve everyday problems related to cleaning, organization, personal care, and pet care.

articles.title: Eufy's stair-climbing robot vacuum might finally convince me to buy one
articles.author: Jasmine Mannan
articles.summary: At IFA 2025, Samsung unveiled a new, albeit expensive, robot vacuum cleaner. This announcement falls within the broader trend of smart home and AI products dominating the trade show.

articles.title: Huawei MatePad Mini Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Huawei officially announced the MatePad Mini on September 04, 2025. The tablet features an 8.8-inch OLED display, HarmonyOS 5.1, up to 12GB of RAM, and 512GB of internal storage. It also includes a dual-camera setup with a 50MP main sensor and a 32MP front camera, with a starting price of P50,932.28.

articles.title: Tineco FLOOR ONE S9 Scientist Wins Gold at Global Product Technology Innovation Awards 2025
articles.author: Adnkronos
articles.summary: Tineco introduced the FLOOR ONE S9 Scientist, a smart floor washer, at IFA Berlin 2025. The FLOOR ONE S9 Scientist features StreakFree and HydroBurst Technologies, a FlashDry Self-Cleaning System, and provides up to 75 minutes of runtime.

articles.title: OnePlus makes its shift from Hasselblad official, debuts DetailMax Engine
articles.author: Nickolas Diaz
articles.summary: OnePlus is developing a new in-house imaging engine called DetailMax Engine after ending its partnership with Hasselblad. The DetailMax Engine aims to deliver clarity and authenticity to photos. Rumors suggest this new engine may debut on the OnePlus 15, expected in late 2025 or early 2026.

articles.title: Dyson GmbH: Now there is no escape for dirt: The Dyson Spot+Scrub Ai
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Spot+Scrub AI, an intelligent, wet-and-dry robotic cleaner, which is Dyson's first foray into the world of intelligent, wet-and-dry robotic cleaning. The Dyson Spot+Scrub AI boasts an advanced AI stain detection system and features a self-cleaning wet roller and powerful performance with hygienic emptying. The Dyson Spot+Scrub AI is available now for €999 (RRP) at Dyson Stores and on dyson.de.

articles.title: First look: Dyson's Spot+Scrub Ai robot seeks out stains
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Dyson introduced its first robot vacuum mop, the Dyson Spot+Scrub Ai, featuring a multifunctional dock. This marks Dyson's entry into the combination robot vacuum and mop market, with its debut at the Dyson store in Berlin.

articles.title: 21 Products Teachers Say Make The School Year Easier
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: The content highlights a range of new products and tools designed to enhance teacher productivity and classroom organization. These include an electric stapler, label maker, Cricut Joy bundle, and other helpful classroom gadgets that are available for purchase on Amazon and other online stores. These introductions are especially valuable for teachers looking to streamline their classroom management and save time.

articles.title: Meet petgugu's World's First Self-Flushing Smart Cat Toilet at IFA: Redefining Hygiene and Health for ...
articles.author: The Daily Times
articles.summary: petgugu, a smart pet product brand, is introduced, indicating a focus on new product offerings within the pet care industry.

articles.title: First Impressions: Dyson's Spot+Scrub AI Robot Designed to Detect and Clean Stains
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Spot+Scrub Ai Robot, a combination robot vacuum and mop, at the IFA tech show in Berlin. It features stain detection, lidar navigation, a self-cleaning roller mop, and a multifunction dock. Launch in China is planned later this year and the US in 2026.

articles.title: DP World launches Morocco-UK service to cut export times, emissions
articles.author: Gulf Business
articles.summary: DP World is launching a new service in Agadir, Morocco, on September 18.

articles.title: Haier TV Presents New Flagship Series at IFA 2025: Big Screens with AI-Powered Immersive Experience
articles.author: Haier Smart Home
articles.summary: Haier TV is presenting its latest QD-MiniLED and Mini LED TV models at IFA 2025. These smart TVs feature AI Center optimization, KEF co-engineered sound, and advanced gaming features, designed for immersive entertainment and seamless integration into connected homes.

articles.title: If Your Life Is Feeling A Bit Discombobulated, These 39 Things Can Help Put Things In Order
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Neutrogena is launching its Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30, a dual-purpose product that combines skin protection and skincare in one bottle. Hatch has released the Hatch Restore 2, which functions as a sunrise alarm, sound machine, smart light, reading light, and wind-down light to promote healthier sleep routines.

articles.title: First look: Dyson's Spot+Scrub Ai robot seeks out stains
articles.author: verge
articles.summary: Dyson has launched its first combination robot vacuum and mop, the Dyson Spot+Scrub Ai Robot. This new product, which debuted at Dyson's Berlin store during the IFA tech show, is a follow-up to the company's 360 VisNav robot vacuum. The robot uses a large roller mop for wet cleaning.

articles.title: These Bar Soaps Are Superior To Bodywash
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: The article recommends several bar soaps from companies like Aveeno, Avène, CeraVe, Dr. Bronner's, Community Goods, Dove, Valitic, Dial, and L'Occitane. These recommendations are based on expert opinions and editor picks, focusing on the soaps' effectiveness, moisturizing properties, and suitability for different skin types and concerns. Community Goods is introducing shampoo and conditioner bars.

articles.title: NEXA FLEX Unleashed: Unmatched Innovation and Customization with the Industry-Leading Smart Match Platform
articles.summary: NEXA is launching the NEXA FLEX, a customizable vaping device featuring dual-performance modes (NORM and TURBO) and a smart match platform. It offers up to 40,000 puffs and adjustable coolness levels using specialized Cool Pods and Visible Pods with various flavor options. The product was previewed at TPE 2025 and Champs Trade Show and is being officially released this September.

articles.title: First look: Dyson's Spot+Scrub Ai robot seeks out stains
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Dyson launched its first combination robot vacuum and mop, the Spot+Scrub Ai Robot, at IFA tech show in Berlin. The Spot+Scrub features AI-powered stain detection, lidar navigation, a self-cleaning roller mop, and a multifunctional dock. Dyson plans to launch the Spot+Scrub in China later this year and the US in 2026.

articles.title: Man of Many Staff Favourites—6 September, 2025
articles.author: Dean Blake
articles.summary: Red Bull released the Summer Edition White Peach, featuring a fresh, fruity taste and B-group vitamins. Quad Lock launched a Wireless Charger kit for motorcycles, providing constant phone charging and IP66 water resistance. Caldera+Lab introduced 'The Eye Serum' to address lines, dark circles, and puffiness. Van Heusen presented their Father's Day Offering, including a Cotton Cable Knit Sweater and Dobby Textured Tie. Sheridan launched the Romi Check Quilt Cover Set in Vine. ASICS reissued the GEL-NIMBUS 10.1 sneakers, and Wild Turkey released the Master's Keep Beacon Kentucky Straight Bourbon.

articles.title: All the 2025 beauty advent calendars available to buy from Boots to Lookfantastic
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Beauty advent calendars are now available for purchase or pre-order, offering a seasonal beauty product.

articles.title: Top 5 robot vacuums of IFA 2025: the biggest swings in autonomous cleaning
articles.author: Caroline Preece
articles.summary: Dreame introduces CyberX, a stair-climbing robot vacuum. Dyson launches 'Spot+Scrub', an AI robot with stain detection. Ecovacs presents DEEBOT X11 OMNICYCLONE with fast charging and a bagless station. Roborock releases Qrevo Curv 2 Pro, focusing on adaptive mobility, and xLean launches TR1, a dual-form robot that converts to handheld mode.

articles.title: பஸால்ட் எஸ்யூவியின் விலையைக் குறைத்த சிட்ரன்.. இப்போ என்ன விலையில்?

articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Superbottoms, Advanso, Blushbaby, LuvLap, Mylo, Bumpers, NeverCry, and Bear & Bunny offer reusable cloth diapers designed for comfort, leakage protection, and sustainability. These diapers are made with skin-friendly fabric, adjustable fittings, and eco-friendly materials, targeting parents seeking economical and environmentally conscious diapering solutions for their babies. The diapers' features include adjustable snaps, breathable layers, and high absorbency.

articles.summary: Lenovo has released two new tablets: the Yoga Tab and the Idea Tab Plus. The Yoga Tab features an 11.1-inch LCD screen with a 144Hz refresh rate and an 8,860 mAh battery, priced at $549.99. The Idea Tab Plus has a 12.1-inch LCD screen, a MediaTek Dimensity 6400 chip, and a 10,200 mAh battery, priced at $269.99.

articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Oppo is anticipated to launch its next-generation F series smartphones this month. The upcoming lineup is projected to feature three models: Oppo F31 5G, Oppo F31 Pro 5G, and Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G.

articles.author: Emma Gill
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced a new "Omelette Maker" gadget, priced at £9.99. This kitchen appliance allows users to easily make omelettes in under 10 minutes, featuring non-stick plates for easy cleaning and requiring minimal supervision during cooking.

articles.title: NEXA FLEX Unleashed: Unmatched Innovation and Customization with the Industry-Leading Smart Match Platform
articles.summary: NEXA has launched the NEXA FLEX, a customizable vaping device featuring dual-performance modes and smart match platform. The NEXA FLEX offers up to 40,000 puffs, adjustable coolness levels, and zero e-liquid residue, with Cool Pod and Visible Pod options. This product was previewed at TPE 2025 and Champs Trade Show before its official market release in September.

articles.title: NEXA FLEX Unleashed: Unmatched Innovation and Customization with the Industry-Leading Smart ...
articles.author: NEXA
articles.summary: NEXA has launched the NEXA FLEX, a vaping device featuring dual-performance modes and a smart match platform. The NEXA FLEX works with Cool Pods and Visible Pods, offering up to 40,000 puffs, adjustable coolness levels, and zero e-liquid residue.

articles.title: DJI Neo drone deal: Self-flying camera drone now £143 on Amazon
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: DJI's Neo drone, a self-flying device with AI-powered tracking, is currently discounted on Amazon, bringing the price down to £143.64. The drone features automated flight routines and can be controlled via a smartphone app, offering users a simple method for capturing unique photos and videos without needing a controller.

articles.title: NLB offers one-time waiver for library fines, one free delivery service until end-2025
articles.author: Gabrielle Chan
org: Ministry of Digital Development and Information
articles.summary: The National Library Board (NLB) launched commemorative items, including a vintage-style tote bag and a retro video cassette ceramic coaster set, along with a card game called 'Chapters: A Library and Archives Game'. This game lets players design their own dream library and will be available later this year, marking the celebration of NLB's 30th anniversary.

articles.title: 36 Products With Results That'll Shock *And* Satisfy You
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: Anua introduced heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil, designed to dissolve makeup, blackheads, and sebum. Essence launched Lash Princess mascara, a cruelty-free product with a cone-shaped fiber brush for dramatic lash enhancement. O'Keeffe's released a concentrated, unscented, and non-greasy hand cream for extremely dry, cracked hands.

articles.title: Of influence and trust: How TikTok Shop is helping businesses to thrive in Malaysia's new retail playground — Yusniza Kamarulzaman
articles.summary: TikTok Shop has emerged as a significant retail platform in Malaysia, enabling businesses to reach wider audiences and promote products through engaging content. The platform leverages urgency, flash deals, and influencer partnerships, particularly benefiting small businesses. Businesses adapt to TikTok's unique environment where authenticity and relatable content drive consumer engagement and sales.

articles.title: Try Artlist Text to Speech
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: Artlist launched AI Voiceover, a text-to-speech tool, offering realistic voiceovers in multiple languages with customizable settings and royalty-free licensing. Available as a standalone plan or bundled with Artlist Max, it integrates with editing software, priced starting at $11.99/month.

articles.title: Three upcoming Apple products will push prices higher than ever
articles.author: Ben Lovejoy
articles.summary: Apple is expected to launch the iPhone Fold next year. It will likely be priced above $2,000, exceeding the cost of competitors like the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold.

articles.title: Samsung's new flagship Galaxy tablets are the iPad Pro for Android fans - but something's missing
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung's new Tab S11 Ultra and Tab S11 are now available for purchase. The starting price for the new tablets is $800.

articles.title: 21 Whimsical Products If You Appreciate A Little Fun With Your Functional
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: Several new products are highlighted, including an acoustic frog speaker, mushroom glass vases, retro-style smiley face slippers, a TonyMoly Jelly Lip Melt, and a handheld duck vacuum. Other interesting product releases includes, a vintage wall sconce, a mini passionfruit dish, a small sardine-themed bag, a Mjolnir meat tenderizer, and a croc-shaped food chopper. Furthermore there are also Banana pudding candle, dachshund-shaped paperclips, daisy-shaped dish brush, Venus flytrap bag clips, mushroom pet bowl, vampire umbrella, climber-shaped hooks, animal-shaped glasses holder, mini bookshelf stress toy, floral Band-Aids, and rainbow bath bombs.

articles.title: Mohist AI Limited Launches TranGPT, an AI Translation and TTS SaaS Platform Empowering Cross-Border Professionals
articles.author: Hong Kong
articles.summary: Mohist AI Limited has launched TranGPT, a multilingual AI-powered translation and text-to-speech SaaS platform. This platform is designed for cross-border e-commerce, international finance, and global business, providing enterprise-grade translation accuracy and natural voice synthesis. TranGPT offers multilingual coverage, real-time AI translation, and enterprise-grade security, with plans for future enhancements including AI-based voice cloning and API integration.

articles.title: The foldable smartphone's moment is finally arriving
articles.author: Harry McCracken
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7 represents the seventh generation of foldable phones, showcasing significant advancements. Google's Pixel 10 Pro Fold, set to ship next month, achieves IP68 water and dust resistance, marking a first for foldable devices. Apple is also reportedly developing a foldable iPhone slated for 2026, signaling confidence in the foldable category.

articles.title: Peter Thomas Roth's New Face Wash in a Whipped Cream Can Is the Most Fun Way to Wash Your Face
articles.author: Carolin Lehmann
articles.summary: Peter Thomas Roth has launched the Water Drench Hyaluronic Whipped Cream Cleanser. This new cleanser offers a unique face washing experience.

articles.title: Lenovo expands its portfolio with AI-powered devices
articles.author: Uniindia News Service
articles.summary: Lenovo unveiled new products at the Innovation World 2025 Event in Berlin, including the 'ThinkBook VertiFlex Concept' with a rotatable screen, the 'Lenovo Legion Go' handheld gaming PC, 'FlickLift' smart image editing overlay, and the new 'Yoga Tab' with a 3.2K display and AI features. These new products are designed for a range of uses including business, gaming, content creation, and general entertainment.

articles.title: 29 Handy Kitchen Items You'll Find Yourself Using Daily
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Ninja introduces the Crispi Air Fryer system, while Emeril Lagasse presents a dual-zone air fryer with multiple cooking functions. Dawn Platinum Powerwash dish spray offers an easy way to clean dishes, and Scrub Daddy can now be upgraded with a soap-dispensing attachment. Oxo has launched a new compact Brew Rapid Brewer, and Ninja presents the Foodi 2-in-1 Flip Toaster. Furthermore, Anyday offers microwaveable cooking essentials and Mike's Hot Honey offers flavorfull ingredient, as well as Caraway with their cookware set.

articles.title: Costeny: the Vaudoise platform to simplify the B2B procurement
articles.summary: Swiss startup Costeny has launched its AI-powered B2B procurement platform, dubbed 'Tinder for Buyers,' designed to streamline the tendering process and enhance transparency. The platform, featuring its AI engine Nexus, intelligently matches buyers with suppliers and offers seamless integration with existing ERP systems like SAP and Microsoft Dynamics.

articles.title: 2 hours in, and Hollow Knight Silksong is already making me feel like I'm playing ...
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Hollow Knight: Silksong introduces Hornet as a new protagonist in a foreign land. This new game evolves from the original Hollow Knight, offering a spindly beast experience with new features.

articles.title: Synanceia god roll
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: Synanceia introduced the Solar Sword, a new weapon in the movement Sword category. The weapon's god rolls align with its classification.

articles.title: BYD's 3.6-ton luxury electric SUV combines 720-mile range with 24K gold emblem
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: BYD is launching the Yangwang U8L Dingshi Edition, an extended-wheelbase version of its luxury off-road SUV. This launch signifies BYD's continued expansion in the high-end electric vehicle market. The U8L measures 5,400 mm long and 2,049 mm wide.

articles.title: Pokemon GO: How To Get Psyduck Swim Ring? (Can It Be Shiny)
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon GO is debuting the costumed Psyduck Swim Ring. This introduction is part of a 2025 Pokemon Concierge Celebration.

articles.title: F THAT I'M MAKING MY OWN LAUNDRY SOAP
articles.author: Robert Lee
articles.summary: The recipe uses 'PINK ZOTE SOAP,' 'BORAX,' and 'ARM & HAMMER LAUNDRY BOOSTER' mixed with hot water. Online influencers are promoting this recipe as an effective laundry soap solution. Users are encouraged to try the recipe and endorse its effectiveness.
